title: Buttons
description: Stylized buttons that respond to user interactions, such as clicks or state changes (hover, disabled).

title: Footer
description: Bottom section of the page, typically including contact information, links, or copyright notices.

title: Navbar
description: Top bar for primary navigation with links to the page's sections.

title: Card
description: Cards that display summarized information, such as profiles, products, or articles.

title: Progress Bar
description: Visual bar showing the progress of a task or loading process.

title: Back-to-Top Button
description: Button that allows users to quickly return to the top of the page.

title: Alerts
description: Pop-up messages that grab the user's attention to show important information.

title: Tooltip
description: Floating messages that appear when hovering over an element.

title: Dropdown
description: Menu that shows additional options when clicked or hovered over.

title: Accordion
description: Collapsible sections to organize content into expandable panels.

title: Tabs
description: Tabs that allow switching between different views or content in the same area.

title: Pagination
description: Component that organizes content into multiple navigable pages.

title: Hamburger Menu
description: Compact menu that expands when clicked, commonly seen on mobile sites.

title: Search Bar
description: Component for entering search queries, with autocomplete options.

title: Sticky Header
description: Header that remains visible while scrolling through the page.

title: Image Lightbox
description: Component to enlarge images in a floating window.

title: Loader
description: Animated indicator showing that something is loading.

title: Toast Notifications
description: Pop-up notifications that disappear automatically after a set time.

title: Sidebar
description: Sidebar that can contain navigation links or additional content.

title: Breadcrumbs
description: Trail of links showing the user's current location in the page hierarchy.

title: Flip Card
description: Animated cards that flip to show content on the back.

title: Countdown Timer
description: Timer that counts down to a specific event.

title: Interactive Forms
description: Stylized forms with real-time validation and custom error messages.

title: Mega Menu
description: Large dropdown menu with multiple categories and links.

title: Gallery
description: Interactive grid for displaying images with enlarged views or special effects.

title: Timeline
description: Design to display events in chronological order.

title: Testimonials
description: Component to display client feedback or quotes.

title: Step Progress
description: Component indicating progress through multiple steps.

title: Video Player
description: Custom video player with controls.

title: Floating Action Button
description: Floating button that opens quick options or actions.

title: Carousel
description: Interactive component for displaying sliding images or content.

title: Calendar
description: Component to display dates and events.

title: Kanban Board
description: Interactive board for managing tasks with drag-and-drop functionality.

title: Map with Markers
description: Interactive map with markers for specific locations.

title: Chat Widget
description: Interactive window for messaging or real-time support.

title: Table
description: Data tables with features like sorting, filtering, or searching.

title: Notification Bell
description: Interactive icon to display recent notifications.

title: Login/Register Form
description: Stylized forms for logging in or creating accounts.
